ComicInfo.Title: Melvin & Jenkins' Guide to Hobbies; Boobs Want to Be a Millionaire; What Really Goes On at Those Teachers’ Conferences; Half Fact/Whole Fact; The Lighter Side of...; Monroe and… the Lawsuit; Mad's All-Purpose Cliche Script for VH1’s Behind The Music; Slithering Heights; The Logic Behind Men and Women’s TV Viewing Choices; A Mad Look at the Courts; A Mad Peek Behind the Scenes at the Discovery Channel; Dudson’s Geeks
ComicInfo.Summary: A cynical look at justice, preparedness, current events, priorities, compliments, technology, therapy, relationships, finances, education, the office, appreciation, and doctors.
ComicInfo.Writer: Desmond Devlin,John Caldwell,Butch D'Ambrosio,Dave Berg,Anthony Barbieri,Michael Gallagher,Duck Edwing,Mike Snider,Sergio Aragonés,Josh Gordon
